chat.title: suggestions
chat.message:
NPO for 1 hour post prostaglandin is not necessary.. the reason they say this is in the unlikely event of stat c-section, however anesthesia guidelines have changed and are OK with eating in labour. Also, if they ate 61min before getting prostaglandin and need a stat section, then it doesn't really matter. . 
There should be a note about nitrogylcrin use in the medications section to make it clear when we use it. Consider moving it to a module for tachysystole management. There is some debate about spray vs IV nitro for tachysystole. 
Is misoprostol part of this? It could / should be... but the old guard might have concerns about that. Maybe misoprostol should be a module that could be included here, or a separate one.

chat.title: Fetal presentation
chat.message: Please add "confirm fetal presentation is cephalic"

chat.title: Brand names
chat.message: pls add "Cervidil" and "Prostin" next to these orders so people know what they are ordering

chat.title: misoprostol
chat.message: Pls have a misoprostol order set built into here

chat.title: Foley catheter
chat.message: Pls add foley catheter orders for cervical ripening into this order set, put it first, and ensure there is an order to reassess the tension on the foley frequently
